title: Oru paithiyam pidikuthu lyrics Baana Kaathaadi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Oru paithiyam pidikuthu penne penne
Adhan vaithiyam unniru kanne kanne
Sirithene naan thaanai mella
Thudithene en ullam solla
Kaadhal baaram sumandhene
Vazhi irundhum sugamaai unnardheney...

Aedhai thedi ne vandhai Adhai thandha pinnalum
ennai theda vaithaaiyadi
Adhirkaalam nigalkaalam ellame ne endru
sollamal thavithenadi
Kelvhithalodu un munne naan nirka
kadhal thaervum illai ho
Thozhvi illamal un nenjai naan vella
vazhigal inga illai
Varuven tharuven oru varthai solla
Vazhiyil yenno naan vizhagi chella
Mounangal pole oru mozhiyedhadi

Nee endhan veetukul naan vazhum setrukul
poovaga poothaiyadi
En inbam en thunbam ennalum ezhaipara
thozhsaaya vandhayadi
Endha vazhi sella puriyamal naan nirka
edhiril oru devadhai ho ..
Ennai naan aaki envazhvai neraki
meetuthandhai ennai
Orunal orunal unnai kannil kandaen
Marunal marunal en nenjil kandaen
Unnakaga uyirodu vazhdhenadi

relatedSongs.title: Thaakkuthe kan thaakkuthe lyrics Baana Kaathadi Song Lyrics

seo.title: Oru paithiyam pidikuthu lyrics Baana Kaathaadi Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Oru paithiyam pidikuthu lyrics Baana Kaathaadi Song Lyrics from Baana Kaathaadi. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Baana Kaathaadi, Yuvan, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
